title: *shits on Yasuo in lane* *20-30m mark comes, Yasuo starts melting entire teams*
body:
I kill him half a dozen times or more, and keep his CS at near half of mine for all of laning. 20-30m mark comes, he has PD and maybe an IE. He goes around killing everyone ridiculously easily.

Well okay, I sure saw the point of trashing him in lane just for him to scale with only 1-2 items by 20-30 minutes.

"b-b-but you shouldn't have let a lategame champ scale"
Oh, thanks for informing me. I didn't know lategame happened at the 15-20m mark and first item.

"b-b-but your fault you didn't end"
Yeah sorry for not killing their Nexus before Yasuo gets his first item. Wow, it's almost like one player out of five being incompetent trash doesn't automatically make the rest of them bad.

"b-b-but you could've just roamed from toplane and helped others"
Yeah, great idea. Tell me that again after Yasuo takes a full heath tower in 2-3 waves. Meanwhile I'm playing against a team who isn't as incompetent as the Yasuo.

replies.body: What if, instead of gaining double crit chance, Yasuo's passive was changed to let him start with 20% crit chance, scaling crit chance from like 5% to 30% levels 1-18, or giving him 10% crit chance for every point invested in his ultimate?  I believe that would make him much more balanced overall, and take away some of his super massive power spike after two items.
Because having entire laning phases decided purely by a lucky crit chain is fun and interactive amirite? *cough* *cough* *Tryndamere* *cough*
That can happen just as--if not more--easily with doubled crit chance.  And there are still crit runes available for other champions too.
crit passives are bullshit.
Well Jhin's is fine imo because it's at least telegraphed.

My bad, I don't expect people who are 0 kills and 4-8+ deaths with half my CS to scale into a complete monster with only PD and maybe an IE by 20-30m.

But of course you'd call it a shitpost. Typical.

> But of course you'd call it a shitpost.

Of course I would. All I see is someone starting a Yasuo circle jerk again. I see no gameplay suggestions and/or fixes, not even any specific things in this post that highlight some seriously annoying stuff. Just some baby crap. That's what I call a shitpost.
Reworking his passive would the easiest way to fix him. Get rid of the 100% crit thing and make him decent all around. He has a super loaded Kit that doesn't make sense, but weebs love it.

Wait, so get rid of crit chance to give him everything else? So make him even more loaded? 

Hello, brains?
I love how next to no one understand that double crit is what balances him, and not what breaks him
I know. But still, asking for removal of a passive on one champion that the person claims is overlaoded then load ore shit into the kit? Is he braindamaged or someshit?
Hello my forum friend 12 year old. Please finish middle school reading comprehension, then come visit us again here in the forums.
"Make him decent all around"  When he has a superloaded kit is plain idiocy. Sure, you aren't making him more loaded, but removing his crit passive doesn't do anything good.

The point I was making is he is already decent in lane phase. He doesn't need the crit bonus too. He gets first blood pretty often and all he does is q twice with an auto attack. He has the damage of Riven with out the crits in the early game, so why does he need both. But yet if they cut his passive/rework it then he might need some compensation buffs if he falls off after 20 minutes and becomes unplayable with out 10 kills.

Cool, because you don't mention that he has a decent laning phase. And no, he does need the double crit bonus, and removing it does nothing good. Remember tank Yasuo? 

"He has the damage of a riven without the crits early game". Yes, because riven builds 5 {{item:3031}}s. And no, Yasuo, in no way deals as much as damage as riven without critting. That's bullshit.
Why cant we have both? A yas that does damage, and doesnt use a dumb mechanic like crit.  I love how people bring up tank yas like we have to pick between toxic or toxic.
Because that's how his kit is designed. If you were to remove his dependence on crit, you open up his build to all the bruiser items, which he will then use to stat check you to oblivion

Because TankSuo was plain stupidity. He statchecked everything while providing stupid disruption with FM, something he can't really do right now because he'd get blown up. He dealt shittons of damage while being impossible to burst down and is melting your team. Current Yasuo can be blown up. Tank Yasuo can't.

"The critical strike passive is what balances Yasuo the most... Why? It dictates his build."

We all know what happens when Yasuo doesn't want to build crit.

And the fact that his complaining how 30 minutes in and he has damage, Just like every other effing character, Something is wrong with his brain if he thinks even if you kill the enemy 1000 times, It nullifies their ability to earn gold to make a comeback at the 30th minute mark.
People still say how 'Feast and famine' is bad but then complain because yasuo can make a comeback. Love hypocrisy.

Its feast OR famine. 

Some champions have a good laning then fall off. Yasuo is not one of those champions. He has a good laning phase (a few bad matchups, but overall pretty good), but if he misses the powerspikes at level 2, 6, and completed Zeal item, he also has good comeback potential - he can be down in levels, cs, and feed a few deaths, but his damage with just a Zeal and IE is ridiculous. 

Pantheon is a feast or famine. Yasuo is dominant at every stage of the game aside from 5v5 teamfights if he doesnt have setup, while also having strong snowballing capabilities and strong comeback capabilities.
I never said he was or wasn't. Just because you don't win lane it doesn't mean you should be useless. Hence why no one likes pantheon.

I would like to remind you what happens when yasuo doesn't want to build crit,

It's known as, tank-yasuo.

Awesome! You're on your way to balancing Yasuo! I 100% agree that he gets too much out of his Critical strike bonus and Q. I'd suggest myself that he can not Lifesteal off of his Q, make it so it is actually an auto attack and he can't just Q in the middle of 2 auto's at level 1, and bam!
